items.content_html: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
items.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

items.content_html: Phishing Shepard is a lightweight, static website designed to help users detect potential phishing attempts by analyzing copied messages for embedded URLs. Built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, this tool extracts URLs from user input, retrieves metadata from the identified links, and provides feedback on their authenticity.
items.title: iosif-gogolos/phishing-shepard: Phishing Shepard is a lightweight, static website designed to help users detect potential phishing attempts by analyzing copied messages for embedded URLs. Built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, this tool extracts URLs from user input, retrieves metadata from the identified links, and provides feedback on their authenticity.

items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.

Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js function that flattens nested JSON objects into a single-level structure with dot-separated keys. Designed for simplicity, flexibility, and deployment as a cloud function, this utility is ideal for transforming complex JSON structures into a more manageable format.

items.content_html: Image Slider Application The Image Slider Application is a responsive, customizable tool for displaying images attractively. It features automatic sliding, manual navigation, and a lightweight design for fast performance. Ideal for portfolios, galleries, and presentations. Access it online via GitHub Pages without installation.
items.title: Honeywealth589/Image-slider-application: Image Slider Application  The Image Slider Application is a responsive, customizable tool for displaying images attractively. It features automatic sliding, manual navigation, and a lightweight design for fast performance. Ideal for portfolios, galleries, and presentations. Access it online via GitHub Pages without installation.

items.content_html: TuneFlow is a lightweight music app built with Angular and NgRx. Manage your local tracks with CRUD operations, enjoy seamless playback with an interactive audio player, and organize songs by categories. Designed for a smooth user experience and scalable architecture.
items.title: Radiaidel/TuneFlow: TuneFlow is a lightweight music app built with Angular and NgRx. Manage your local tracks with CRUD operations, enjoy seamless playback with an interactive audio player, and organize songs by categories. Designed for a smooth user experience and scalable architecture.
